DEMO_526_MSG_030:
́Is the video rolling for ȁ?
I hope this will do... I haven't seen him in a while.
DEMO_526_MSG_040:
́To be honest... I'm starting to reach a breaking point.
I'm not sure, at this rate, how much longer I can carry on.
ā
DEMO_526_MSG_050:
́The situation looks pretty grim at the moment, and it's 
all because of me... I'm simply not strong enough.
ā
DEMO_526_MSG_060:
́However... I refuse to give up. I cannot allow these Break Monsters to destroy our world!
ā
DEMO_526_MSG_070:
́I set out to rid the world of this darkness that 
continues to contaminate both humans and monsters alike.
ā
DEMO_526_MSG_080:
́So, we will defeat it and come home. For you... ȁ.
ā
DEMO_526_MSG_100:
́You are you.... you are not me.... and this allows you to live your life any way you see fit.
ā
DEMO_526_MSG_090:
́In the event that I do not return... I have no expectations for you to carry out my wishes... live your own life.
ā
DEMO_526_MSG_110: ́ȁ... no one else can choose your path in life. Only you can do that... never forget this!
